roleset.name: gather together
roleset.note: MARSHAL-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from marshal.01-v)

example.name: somewhat marshal context
example.text: On Election Day -- November 4 -- he energetically marshalled his force of bludgeon men , bribers , and experts in [*] forging repeat votes .
example.arg: his force of bludgeon men , bribers , and experts in [*] forging repeat votes

example.name: war of words
example.text: They-1 took nearly a month [*]-1 to investigate , marshal statistics , and put their arguments down in black and white .
